title: Tom Collins Recipe
full_text:
Tom Collins Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
4 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
gin
1/2
ounce
fresh lemon juice
1/2
ounce
simple syrup
Chilled
club soda
Directions
Combine ingredients other than club soda in a cocktail shaker with ice, and shake until well-chilled. Strain into a Collins glass with lots of ice and top with chilled club soda. Insert straw and do what comes natural.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker, cocktail strainer

How Old Mr. Boston Got His Groove Back
